mutants.code:
def rotate(nums, steps):
    steps = steps * len(nums)
    pivot = len(nums) - steps
    return nums[pivot:] + nums[:pivot]

def rotate(nums, steps):
    steps = steps + len(nums)
    pivot = len(nums) - steps
    return nums[pivot:] + nums[:pivot]

def rotate(nums, steps):
    steps = steps % len(nums)
    pivot = len(nums) + steps
    return nums[pivot:] + nums[:pivot]

def rotate(nums, steps):
    steps = steps % len(nums)
    pivot = len(nums) * steps
    return nums[pivot:] + nums[:pivot]

def rotate(nums, steps):
    steps = steps % len(nums)
    pivot = len(nums) - steps
    return nums[pivot:] - nums[:pivot]

def rotate(nums, steps):
    steps = steps % len(nums)
    pivot = len(nums) - steps
    return nums[pivot:] * nums[:pivot]
